column5: Looking for a special, comfortable and convenient place to stay?   Our separate guesthouse has all you need for a great trip. Located in a very urban, up-and-coming, funky, and transitioning 1930's neighborhood. The cottage comes with a private driveway and secure gated parking. We are located near downtown, all major freeways and near top venues. Including Houston's newest hot spot; the White Oak Music Hall.  We would love to host you during your stay in Houston!
column8: CHARMING CASITA IN THE CITY - Easy, gated parking!
